text: Hi community! I'm having an issue setting up a flexible redirect
However, HubSpot is giving me an issue saying "domain not hosted on HubSpot" when in fact it is. Is it the https?: that is causing an issue

*Unable to find Content Security Policy/Nonce solution for web-interactive-embed for site with Content Security Policy set*

We're using the web-interactive-embed in our website. Due to security rules our Content Security Policy is set to the following:
```object-src 'self'; font-src 'self' https: blob: data:; img-src * blob: data:; default-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https: blob: ws: wss:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https: blob: was: ws: 'nonce-kDriE7hRJFnHJEhTATRMZA=='; media-src * blob: data:; style-src * 'self' https: 'sha256-7LoTEw2TxB01eYN/xj2eYFU/cUpJk3OA+M6GXZH7D98=' 'sha256-WRTfUAFaXV9mm0+Gja6FDQnb5GWWyjaHWaKCChhJJwA=' 'sha256-SvLgADqEePEV9RNxBrRQXSBJafFHcVNG7cPzHz6h9eA=' 'sha256-ZMvWTJyEDzuSxYe/hLEpWeylbRkyNlCv3Wd6tLTvSlQ=' 'sha256-L1tVp84zhE2g2TZT86ckrCX6Fw/5Kk+8rLO3wG869Fg=' 'nonce-kDriE7hRJFnHJEhTATRMZA=='```
You can see that inline styles are disabled with the exception of nonces/SHA256 hashes.

I see that the HubSpot code generates new content each page load so I can't generate a static hash. Anyone know if there's support for nonces for `<style>` tags?

Thanks in advance!
